content.raw:
I fixed the failure in the [log here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/b8d3ba1b8070a765bd62) and have tested on Ubuntu, Mac OSX.  
The failure is due to the many bouncing back for Bullet Lemke solver, while it was considered only one before. So I deactivate the many more  
bounce-back for Bullet Lemke solver 
 
Commit [4c7549b](https://bitbucket.org/rosebudflyaway/gazebo/commits/4c7549b9c46013108c0568ce8a4d1e84368e36d0)   

It seems I cannot run Jenkins build, [failure information](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-external-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/36/console)   

If there is still failure, would you mind giving me access to the Jenkins platform, so that I could reproduce and debug?   
I cannot reproduce the failure, which makes checking the logic to debug not so straightforward. 

Let me know if there is any concern
content.html:
I fixed the failure in the log here and have tested on Ubuntu, Mac OSX.
The failure is due to the many bouncing back for Bullet Lemke solver, while it was considered only one before. So I deactivate the many more
bounce-back for Bullet Lemke solver
